name: Gabriel Hugh Elkaim
content: Gabriel Hugh Elkaim Â Â Â Â Gabriel Hugh Elkaim Â Associate Professor Engineering II-337B 831.459.3054 (W) 831.459.4829 (F) elkaim@soe.ucsc.edu I am an associate professor in the Computer Engineering department at the University of California, Santa Cruz. My research is primarily on applied control systems with a focus on autonomous and embedded systems. I founded the Autonomous Systems Lab at UC Santa Cruz. The work I do includes guidance, navigation and control (GNC), GPS research,Â  sensor fusion, attitude estimation, system identification (SysID), Unmanned Air Vehicles (UAVs), and robust software design for real time reactive systems.
